title: Random Table JSON Template Specification v1.0
description: A JSON schema for configurable random table generators supporting weighted tables, composite tables, template-based text generation, mathematical operations, conditional logic, multi-level table inheritance, external file references, and generation-time shared variables.

imports.description: Array of external file imports for modular content organization. Imports are resolved before any table or template processing.

tables.description: Array of table definitions. At least one table is required. Tables can be simple (weighted entries), composite (select from source tables), or collection (merge multiple tables).

templates.description: Array of text generation pattern templates that combine multiple tables and operations using {{...}} syntax.

conditionals.description: Array of conditional logic rules applied after primary generation based on rolled results.

metadata.title: Metadata Object
metadata.description: Contains information about the file itself and global engine configuration.

namespace.description: Unique namespace to prevent collisions. Use dot-separated segments (e.g., 'fantasy.core', 'scifi.names').

version.description: Semantic version number for this file (e.g., '1.0.0', '2.1.0-beta').

specVersion.description: The specification version this file conforms to. Must be '1.0' for this schema.

created.description: ISO 8601 date-time string for creation date

updated.description: ISO 8601 date-time string for last update

maxRecursionDepth.description: Maximum depth for nested table/template references. Prevents infinite loops from circular references.

maxExplodingDice.description: Maximum number of times exploding dice (!) can re-roll.

maxInheritanceDepth.description: Maximum depth for inheritance chains. For example, C extends B extends A has depth 2.

uniqueOverflowBehavior.description: Behavior when unique selection requests more entries than available.

metadataSource.title: Source Attribution
metadataSource.description: Optional properties for tracking content origin and licensing at the file level.

book.description: Name of the source book or product

url.description: URL to product page or official source

license.description: License under which content is used

holder.description: Legal entity name that holds the copyright

examples: © 2024 Example Games LLC. All rights reserved.

rights.title: Rights & Permissions
rights.description: Intellectual property rights, usage permissions, and legal contact information for content protection.

official.description: Whether this is official publisher content (vs. fan-made)

productIdentity.description: List of Product Identity elements (names, characters, logos, etc.) that are protected

examples: Compatible with 5th Edition fantasy roleplaying. Not affiliated with or endorsed by Wizards of the Coast.

termsUrl.description: URL to full terms of use

communityPolicyUrl.description: URL to fan content/community use policy

rightsPermissions.title: Usage Permissions
rightsPermissions.description: Explicit permissions for how the content may be used

commercialUse.description: Whether content may be used in commercial products

modification.description: Whether content may be modified or adapted

derivativeWorks.description: Whether derivative works may be created

attributionRequired.description: Whether attribution is required when using content

rightsContact.title: Legal Contact Information
rightsContact.description: Contact information for licensing and legal inquiries

licensing.description: Email or URL for licensing inquiries

dmca.description: DMCA agent contact for takedown requests

tableSource.title: Table Source Attribution
tableSource.description: Source attribution for a specific table, useful when combining content from multiple sources.

url.description: Direct URL to source if available online

license.description: License for this specific table (overrides file-level license)

import.title: Import Definition
import.description: References tables, templates, and variables from an external JSON file.

path.description: Relative path (e.g., './creatures/undead.json'), parent directory path (e.g., '../shared/core.json'), or absolute URL (e.g., 'https://rolldeo.com/tables.json').

alias.description: Local alias for referencing imported content. Must be unique within the file. Cannot contain periods.

description.description: Human-readable description of what this import provides

table.title: Table Definition
table.description: A table definition. Can be simple (weighted entries), composite (select from source tables), or collection (merge multiple tables).

id.description: Unique identifier for the table within the namespace. Cannot contain periods. Cannot be a reserved word.

type.description: Table type: 'simple' for weighted entries, 'composite' for selecting from source tables, 'collection' for merging multiple tables.

hidden.description: If true, table won't appear in user-facing lists. Still fully accessible to templates and other tables.

extends.description: ID of table to inherit from. Supports 'alias.tableId' for imported tables and 'namespace.tableId' for namespaced tables.

simpleTable.title: Simple Table
simpleTable.description: A basic table with weighted entries. The most common table type, optimized for ease of data entry.

entries.description: Array of table entries with values and optional weights/ranges

compositeTable.title: Composite Table
compositeTable.description: Selects which source table to roll on using weighted probability, then rolls once on that table. Use when you want weighted selection between different tables.

sources.description: Array of source tables to select from, with optional weights

collectionTable.title: Collection Table
collectionTable.description: Merges all entries from multiple tables into a single unified pool. Use for combining related tables (e.g., 'Swords' + 'Axes' + 'Polearms' = 'All Melee Weapons').

collections.description: Array of table IDs to combine. Supports 'alias.tableId' and 'namespace.tableId' syntax.

items.description: Table ID reference to include in the collection

compositeSource.title: Composite Source
compositeSource.description: A source table reference for composite tables with optional weight.

tableId.description: ID of the table to pull from. Supports 'alias.tableId' and 'namespace.tableId' syntax.

weight.description: Relative weight for selecting this source. Weight of 0 disables this source from random selection.

entry.title: Table Entry
entry.description: A single entry in a simple table. Normally requires a value. When overriding an inherited entry (via 'id' in an extended table), 'value' becomes optional - only 'id' plus the properties you want to change are needed. Can optionally specify weight OR range (not both). If neither specified, defaults to weight: 1.

id.description: Unique ID within this table. Required for inheritance overrides. If omitted, auto-generated as {tableId}{NNN}.

value.description: The output text. Supports Markdown formatting and {{...}} template syntax for nested evaluation, dice rolls, math expressions, table references, roll captures ({{N*table >> $var}}), capture access ({{$var[0].@prop}}), property aggregation ({{collect:$var.@prop}}), and switch expressions ({{switch[cond:result].else[fallback]}}).

weight.description: Relative probability weight. Must be 0 or greater. Weight of 0 disables the entry from random selection but preserves it for inheritance. Mutually exclusive with 'range'.

rangeArray.title: Range
rangeArray.description: A two-element inclusive range for dice-roll style tables (e.g., [1, 5] means numbers 1-5, weight = 5). Mutually exclusive with 'weight'. Converted to weight as: weight = (range[1] - range[0]) + 1.

setsObject.title: Sets (Placeholder Values)
setsObject.description: Key-value pairs that set placeholder values (accessible via @key syntax) when this entry is selected. Merges with and overrides table's defaultSets.

assetsObject.title: Assets
assetsObject.description: Key-value pairs mapping asset types to file paths or URLs. Common keys: image, token, thumbnail, portrait, sound, music, handout, statblock.

additionalProperties.description: Asset path: relative path, absolute URL, or data URI

template.title: Template Definition
template.description: A text generation pattern that combines multiple tables and operations using {{...}} syntax.

id.description: Unique identifier for the template. Cannot be a reserved word.

pattern.description: Template pattern string. Use {{tableId}} for table rolls, {{dice:XdY}} for dice, {{$var}} for variables, {{@placeholder}} for placeholders, {{math:expr}} for math, {{N*table >> $var}} for captures, {{$var[0].@prop}} for capture access, {{collect:$var.@prop}} for aggregation, {{switch[cond:result].else[fallback]}} for inline conditionals, {{expr.switch[cond:result]}} for attached conditionals. Supports Markdown.

conditional.title: Conditional Rule
conditional.description: Applies logic based on rolled results. Evaluated after primary generation.

when.description: Condition expression. Supports comparisons (==, !=, >, <, >=, <=, contains, matches) and logical operators (&&, ||, !). Use @placeholder.property for entry values, $variable for variables.

action.description: Action to perform when condition is true: append (add to end), prepend (add to start), replace (replace target), setVariable (set a variable).

target.description: Required for 'replace' and 'setVariable' actions. For 'append'/'prepend', defaults to current output.

value.description: Value to apply. May contain template syntax ({{...}}) for dynamic content. Supports Markdown.

variables.title: Static Variables
variables.description: Static global variables loaded at engine initialization. Referenced using {{$variableName}}. Evaluated once at file load time. For generation-time values, use 'shared' instead.

shared.title: Shared Variables (Generation-Time)
shared.description: Generation-time variables evaluated once at the start of each generation and remain constant throughout that run. Referenced using {{$variableName}}. Evaluated in declaration order. Cannot forward-reference other shared variables. All shared variables capture the full roll result including sets, enabling {{$varName.@property}} syntax with dynamic table resolution.

tableShared.title: Table/Template Shared Variables
tableShared.description: Table or template-level shared variables evaluated lazily when rolled. Cannot shadow document-level shared or static variables. Propagate to nested table references. Referenced using {{$variableName}}. All shared variables capture the full roll result including sets, enabling {{$varName.@property}} syntax with dynamic table resolution.

resultType.title: Result Type
resultType.description: Classification of output type. Case-insensitive, user-definable. Common values: creature, npc, faction, item, loot, location, encounter, event, hook, complication, name, trait, effect, environment, ability, description, rumor, dialogue, statistic, number, currency, time, weather. Custom types should use namespace conventions (e.g., 'publisher/category/type').

tagsArray.title: Tags
tagsArray.description: Tags for categorization, organization, filtering, and searching
